channel.title: How can I add server status for my website?
channel.description: Please people help for me, How can I add to my website info when are server status online and offline? Something like a moparscape server status page? Please help! Thanks for all.

item.title: How can I add server status for my website?
item.dc:creator: @Shkic Shkic
item.description:
@Shkic wrote:

Just can anyone tell me private server page where I can add my server? Without this http://aahost.nozonenet.com/serverstatus/serverstatus.php

Read full topic
